speakers.name: gubsheep
speakers.bio: gubsheep is co-founder of 0xPARC Foundation. He works on applications of cryptography, particularly zero-knowledge. Previously, he supported zero-knowledge R&D efforts at Ethereum Foundation and built Dark Forest, the first on-chain strategy game.

speakers.name: Vitalik Buterin
speakers.bio: Vitalik Buterin is the co-founder of Ethereum, a researcher at the Ethereum Foundation, and an entrepreneur.
